user_query: I want to surprise my best friend with a personalized gift. Can you help me find some relevant images and suggest search queries related to gift ideas? Also, provide me with the supported languages and countries for search in the Bing Web Search tool.

TaskList.description: Use the Bing Web Search API to generate search queries related to personalized gift ideas.
Utilize the Bing Web Search API to retrieve relevant images based on the generated search queries.
Query the Bing Web Search API for supported languages and countries.
